name: Marble Elements
description:
Description: A bouncy marble labyrinth!

Objectives: Simply collect 7 "Pieces of Eight" and the eighth coin will turn into the Level Exit. Just don't fall in a hole! :-)

Tips: Bounce off of walls at the correct angles to maintain speed.

Version Information: In this version of the game there is no time limit, and players start over from the Level Select Screen upon running out of lives.
